pagetools.sections.admin module¶

pagetools.sections.dashboard_modules module¶

class pagetools.sections.dashboard_modules.PageNodesModule(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: grappelli.dashboard.modules.DashboardModule

A module that displays a page with nodes. A “page” should be the root-pagenode model. Overwrite model = <YourModel>

from django import forms ... def _media(self):

return forms.Media(
js=[“bower_components/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js”,
“bower_components/jquery-bonsai/jquery.bonsai.js”, “js/nodetree.js” ],

css = {‘all’: [‘bower_components/jquery-bonsai/jquery.bonsai.css ‘]}

)

media = property(_media)
